subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Warde J. Manuel, who raised expectations of student-athletes as the athletic director at Buffalo, takes over at UConn as its men’s basketball team is facing academic issues and an ailing coach.
snippet: Warde J. Manuel, who raised expectations of student-athletes as the athletic director at Buffalo, takes over at UConn as its men’s basketball team is facing academic issues and an ailing coach.
